epic-context.epic-goal: Establish the foundational infrastructure for the Ultra BMS application by initializing a monolithic architecture with Spring Boot backend and Next.js frontend. Create local development environment, database configuration, in-memory caching layer, core domain models, and standardized REST API patterns.

epic-scope.in-scope: - Monorepo initialization with backend (Spring Boot 3 + Java 17) and frontend (Next.js 15 + TypeScript) - Local PostgreSQL database setup with Hibernate auto-schema generation - Ehcache configuration for application-level caching (no distributed cache) - Core JPA entities: User, Property, Unit with relationships and auditing - REST API foundation with global exception handling and CORS configuration - Code quality tooling: ESLint, Prettier, Checkstyle, pre-commit hooks - API documentation with SpringDoc OpenAPI (Swagger UI) - Docker Compose configuration for local PostgreSQL - Developer documentation for local setup
epic-scope.out-of-scope: - AWS infrastructure deployment (planned for later phase) - CI/CD pipelines (planned for later phase) - Redis or distributed caching (using Ehcache only) - Authentication and authorization (covered in Epic 2) - Frontend UI components beyond basic structure (implemented per-module) - Message queues or async processing infrastructure (added as needed) - Monitoring and logging infrastructure (added in later phase)

step.title: Initialize Backend Project
step.tasks: - Run Spring Initializr command to generate backend/ directory - Extract generated files - Add additional dependencies to pom.xml (Ehcache, Lombok, MapStruct, SpringDoc) - Configure Maven wrapper (./mvnw) - Create application.yml and application-dev.yml - Verify build: ./mvnw clean install

step.title: Initialize Frontend Project
step.tasks: - Run create-next-app command to generate frontend/ directory - Initialize shadcn/ui with npx shadcn@latest init - Install additional dependencies (react-hook-form, zod, recharts, axios) - Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode and path aliases - Update tailwind.config.ts to ensure dark theme default - Verify build: npm run build

step.title: Configure Code Quality Tools
step.tasks: - Frontend: Extend .eslintrc.json with recommended rules - Frontend: Create .prettierrc with formatting rules - Backend: Add checkstyle.xml with Google Java Style - Backend: Add Maven Checkstyle plugin to pom.xml - Root: Install Husky and create pre-commit hook script - Frontend: Configure lint-staged in package.json - Test: Make intentional formatting error, verify pre-commit hook rejects it

step.title: Configure Development Servers
step.tasks: - Backend: Set server.port=8080 in application-dev.yml - Backend: Create CorsConfig.java to allow http://localhost:3000 with credentials - Frontend: Update next.config.js to proxy /api/* requests to http://localhost:8080 - Frontend: Create .env.example template - Test: Start both servers, verify frontend can reach backend (will need health endpoint from Story 1.5)

step.title: Setup Project Documentation
step.tasks: - Create comprehensive README.md at project root - Add project overview and tech stack summary - Document prerequisites (Java 17, Node.js 20+, Docker optional) - Provide setup instructions (clone, install, start) - Explain project structure - List common commands (build, test, lint) - Add troubleshooting section - Create .editorconfig with consistent formatting rules - Create comprehensive .gitignore (Node.js, Java, IDE, OS files)

step.title: Setup Docker Compose (Optional)
step.tasks: - Create docker-compose.yml at project root with PostgreSQL 15-alpine service - Configure: database ultra_bms_dev, user ultra_bms_user, port 5432, persistent volume - Document in README.md: `docker-compose up -d` to start PostgreSQL - Add docker-compose.override.yml to .gitignore

step.title: Create Initial Backend Package Structure
step.tasks: - Create package directories: config, controller, service, repository, entity, dto, mapper, exception, security, util - Create placeholder classes with JavaDoc in each package - Document package purpose in README

step.title: Create Initial Frontend Directory Structure
step.tasks: - Organize src/app/ with route groups: (auth)/, (dashboard)/, layout.tsx, page.tsx - Create src/components/: ui/ (empty), forms/ (placeholder), layout/ (placeholder) - Create src/lib/: api.ts (Axios setup), utils.ts, constants.ts - Create src/hooks/ (placeholder) - Create src/types/ (placeholder)

step.title: Verify End-to-End Setup
step.tasks: - Start backend: cd backend && ./mvnw spring-boot:run - Verify backend accessible at http://localhost:8080 - Start frontend: cd frontend && npm run dev - Verify frontend accessible at http://localhost:3000 - Verify hot reload: Make change to frontend component, confirm auto-reload - Verify hot reload: Make change to backend controller, confirm auto-restart (Spring DevTools) - Run backend build: ./mvnw clean install - verify success - Run frontend build: npm run build - verify success - Commit initial project structure to Git
